p: On 28 June 2014, an 80-year-old male patient admitted to Guangzhou Eighth Peopleâ€™s Hospital due to high fever, headache and myalgia, and he was laboratory diagnosed as autochthonous dengue. Subsequently, an unexpected dengue outbreak attacked Guangzhou, resulting in 43,031 laboratory-confirmed dengue cases as of Oct, 2014. This outbreak is the largest and most severe epidemic of dengue fever documented in China [ 6], and we reported the main epidemiological and virological features of this outbreak in this study.
